That's great! Remember to also consider Luna's individual needs and preferences, such as her age, size, and personality, when choosing a pet bed. It's essential to find a bed that provides the right level of comfort, support, and relief for her skin issues.

Additionally, don't hesitate to reach out to your veterinarian for recommendations or advice on pet beds that can help with skin health or allergy relief. They may have specific suggestions or brands that they trust and recommend.

By taking the time to research and find the right pet bed, you can help improve Luna's comfort and quality of life. Good luck in your search, and I hope you find the perfect bed for your furry friend!
